filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"> <$list filter="[search[zh]]"> [[TMO|https://oscaf.sourceforge.net/tmo.html#tmo:taskReference]]是指Task Management Ontology，翻译过来就是任务管理本体。TMO本体可用于描述个人的个人任务，也称为待办事项列表。它基于RDF和NRL，Nepomuk表示语言和其他语义Web本体。总的来说，可以详细清楚地管理个人待办任务。下面列出对应的字段名称和其值。有一些字段的功能重复了，可自由选择。 <$list filter="[!search[zh]]"> [[TMO|https://oscaf.sourceforge.net/tmo.html#tmo:taskReference]] refers to the Task Management Ontology. In general, it allows for the detailed and clear management of individual pending tasks. The TMO Ontology can be used to describe personal tasks of individuals, also known as to-do lists. It is based on RDF and NRL, the Nepomuk Representational Language and other Semantic Web ontologies.The corresponding field names and their values are listed below. Some of the fields have duplicated functions and can be freely selected. * Due Date截止日期 * Target Start Time目标开始时间 * Actual End Time实际结束时间 * Actual Start Time实际开始时间 * Target End Time目标截止时间 * Target Completion目标完成 * Importance任务重要性 * Urgency紧急程度 * Priority优先级 ** High高 ** Medium中 ** Low低 * Task State任务的状态 ** New新任务 ** Running进行中 ** Completed完成任务 ** Archived归档 ** Terminated终止任务 ** Suspended暂停任务 ** Repetitive重复任务 * Repeat Interval间隔次数 * Ability Carrier Involvement有能力且参与的人 * Task Transmission任务交接 ** Rejected_Transmitted拒绝但已交接 ** Accepted_NotTransmitted已接收但未交接 ** Accepted_Transmitted接收且交接 ** Rejected_NotTransmitted拒绝且未交接 ** NotTransmitted未交接 ** Transmitted已交接 * Super Task超级任务 * Task Goal任务目标 * Task Description描述任务 * Task Privacy State任务保密状态 * Task Source任务来源 * Involved Persons参与人员 * Attachment附件 * Delegability可委托性 * Dependency依赖 * Next Review Intervall下次回顾间隔 * Context Thread上下文进程 * Task Name任务名称 * Index Position索引位置 * Log Entry日志条目 * Sub Task子任务 * Actual Completion实际完成度 * Last Review Date上次回顾时间 * Sub Task Ordering子任务排序 * Task Reference任务参考 * Task Id任务ID号 * Number Of Completions完成次数"},"$:/TraitTag/TMO/Task":{"created":"20230219143648537","text":"The tmo:task is the central entitiey of the tmo. Task can range from vague things to be possibly done in e distant future to concrete things to be done in a precise forseeable manner. It is not unrealisitc to assume that knowledge worker have hundred or more tasks a Basic Usage # Provide a <> layout, use `ctrl+shift+L` to switch to this view ## or open it using a layout launcher like <> on the sidebar # When the layout opens, there are a few buttons at the top ## On the left is a series of add buttons that, when clicked, jump back to the default layout and add new tiddlers ## On the right are buttons that jump directly back to the default layout # Once you've added a few tiddlers, a table of data is displayed at the bottom of the layout, listing the tiddlers you've added. ## Clicking on the title of a tiddler in the table will jump back to the default layout and open that entry !! Tags The following tags are used in this entry to indicate that the entry records a symptom or health condition, the add button actually creates the entry with these tags: <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/debuff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/buff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/medicine]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/condition]]"> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{!!text}} /> {{!!caption}} - {{!!description}} You can make your own [ext[SuperTag|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag/]] by adding [[$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status]] tags to any tiddler. lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/language/ !!基本用法 # 提供<>布局，使用 `ctrl+shift+L` 切换到该视图 ## 或使用侧边栏上的<>等布局启动器打开它 # 打开布局后，顶部有一些按钮 ## 左边是一系列添加按钮，点击后会跳转回默认布局，并添加新的条目 ## 右边是直接跳转回默认布局的按钮 # 等你添加了一些条目后，布局底部会显示一个数据表格，列出你添加的条目 ## 点击表格里的条目标题，会跳转回默认布局，并打开该条目 !! 标签 以下是本条目里用到的，用于表明条目记录了症状或健康情况的标签，添加按钮其实就是创建了带有这些标签的条目： <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/debuff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/buff]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/medicine]] [[$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/tags/condition]]"> <$macrocall $name="tag" tag={{!!text}} /> {{!!caption}} - {{!!description}} 你可以通过给任意条目添加 [[$:/TraitTag/OPMI/Status]] 标签来制作你自己的[ext[超级标签|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag/]]。"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/layout/IntentionTower":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/intention-tower-knowledge-graph/layout/IntentionTower","text":"\import
